title: Validation and Application of Assessment Tools Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematics curriculum design and cognitive psychology
context.additional_context: Learning cognitive load management strategies to optimize math education content for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three components of cognitive load theory (intrinsic, extraneous, germane load) and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners understand and can apply methods to evaluate the validity of a French translation cognitive load questionnaire.
Cognitive load measurement tools can be utilized to analyze educational effectiveness when designing learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
